body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah E. Owen Stewart in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on September 13, 1842. Father of Edward Stewart, Owen Stewart, Mary Stewart, Lucy Stewart, and Sallie Stewart. Merchant in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Merchant in Louisville in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Louisville in 1860. Produce broker in partnership with Thomas O. Barter in Stewart & Barter in Louisville in 1861.
